name: Boynton Beach
description: Licensed Boynton Beach electricians providing 24/7 professional residential and commercial services. Solomon Electric is your trusted local choice for safe, reliable power solutions throughout Boynton Beach.
tagline: The Gateway to the Gulf Stream

challenges.title: Coastal Weather Vulnerability
challenges.description: Boynton's proximity to the Gulf Stream means intense seasonal weather. We prioritize whole-home surge protection and robust backup power solutions for coastal residents.

challenges.title: Established Community Safety
challenges.description: Mature neighborhoods require expert electrical auditing to ensure aging panels and wiring can safely handle modern technology loads and high-efficiency HVAC.

challenges.title: Waterfront Dock Electrical
challenges.description: With its active marina and waterfront properties, Boynton requires specialized dock wiring and boat lift power that meets strict marine safety standards.

faqs.question: Do you provide emergency repairs for Boynton Beach residences?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer 24/7 emergency electrical service to all Boynton Beach neighborhoods, ensuring your power is restored quickly and safely.

faqs.question: Are your electricians licensed to work in Boynton Beach?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We are fully licensed (FL License #EC13012419) and insured, with years of experience serving the Palm Beach County community.

seoContent.heading: Trusted Boynton Beach Electricians Since 2003
seoContent.body: Boynton Beach is a city of incredible natural beauty and growing opportunity. Known as the 'Gateway to the Gulf Stream,' it's a community that values its coastal heritage and its future progress. Solomon Electric is proud to provide the safe and reliable electrical foundation Boynton families and businesses need to thrive.

seoContent.heading: Excellence in Electrical Care for Your Boynton Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're finishing a remodel in Canyon Lakes, needing dock power near the marina, or requiring an urgent repair in Aberdeen, our licensed team is here for you. We provide upfront pricing, clean workmanship, and a dedication to safety that has made us a local leader for over 15 years.
